subject: Steroids
Football
lead_paragraph: David Jacobs, a convicted steroids dealer who provided evidence to the N.F.L. that tied several players to performance-enhancing drugs, was found shot to death Thursday at his home in Texas.
snippet: David Jacobs, a convicted steroids dealer who provided evidence to the N.F.L. that tied several players to performance-enhancing drugs, was found shot to death Thursday at his home in Texas.
